entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
